Summary: The staff were all very friendly.  The rooms are not fancy, but they are newly renovated, the mattress was comfortable, and it was clean. Nice shower, and our room had a little separate area with a couch and small desk. It was perfect to put our stroller in and store some things after Disneyland for the next day.  It is about a 20 minute brisk walk to Disneyland, or if you are a slower Walker with kids then I would say 25-30 minute walk, but that’s going slow taking your time.  It was doable for sure.  Great stay at a great price. Also, breakfast was pretty good as well, eggs, sausage, bacon and waffles. They had 3 cereals, coffee, juices, bagels and toast. Highly recommend!
Manager Response: none

Summary: We had a 3 day stay at Capri Suites Anaheim. The room was very clean and basic (no frills). It is newly renovated with all new beds, furniture, flooring and paint.  It has a microwave, small refrigerator, large screen TV and comfortable beds. The hot breakfast is delicious, and the customer service was great. You can catch the bus for Disneyland right outside their lobby door. Also, you can see the fireworks at Disneyland from the 4th floor next to the elevator!  We enjoyed our stay.
Room tip: 4th floor offers good view of fireworks at Disneyland.
Manager Response: Hello Diane! Thank you so much for the kind words. We are thrilled to know that your stay was enjoyable and meet your needs for your trip! We hope to see you back with us on your next trip to Anaheim!

Summary Heading: Amazing stay for a bff weekend in Disney!
Summary: First, the customer service was AMAZING!!! I called a few weeks ahead of time to see if a package could be delivered and they were beyond accommodating. When we arrived they were so kind and courteous.  Second, they have a hot continental breakfast.  Although we didn’t eat it (we just grabbed coffee) it looked delicious.   Although the hotel is not walking distance to Disney it’s on the Harbour bus route with a stop right outside the hotel and only a $5-7 Uber ride.   The price point for us was amazing at under $100usd per night.   The rooms were great and seemed newly renovated. The bed was super comfortable with tons of pillows. The bathroom had a tiled walk in shower with body wash, shampoo and conditioner dispensers on the wall.  My only complaint was that there was not
Room tip: It’s not ideally walking distance to Disney to be prepared to either take the bus or Uber for a...
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel was very clean, great breakfast selection, friendly staff. The only minor issue was the front room with the pull out couch had a large door gap so very cold air got in. Room 209 you can’t turn the heater on because then the bedroom got way too hot. The front room was very cold.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I recommend this hotel it is very nice and has great costumer service. I want to thank Angel for providing the best service for me and my family. He was very attentive to us and helped us to make this reservation easier. Thanks for everything Angel you are the best!
Manager Response: none

Summary: I truly believe this place is great. The staff was polite and super helpful. Specially Jennie she has amazing costumer service and made sure my stay was great. It truly exceeded my expectations. And its a short walk from Disney as well. so that was even better.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing our hotel and for taking the time to share your wonderful experience with us. We are thrilled to hear that you had a great stay and that our staff exceeded your expectations.  It is always gratifying to receive such positive feedback, and we will be sure to share your kind words with our team. We are especially delighted to hear that Jennie provided you with exceptional customer service, and we will make sure to pass on your compliments to her.  Our location is definitely a plus, and we are glad that you found it convenient to walk to Disney. We take great pride in providing a comfortable and convenient experience for our guests, and we are delighted to know that we were able to meet your expectations.  Thank you again for your kind words, and we hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back to our hotel in the near future.  Warmest regards, Capri Suites Team

Summary: I have no words to describe the high level of customer service we were offered, many people might pay way more with really bad customer service and this was the whole opposite!!! I am truly amazed on how well the whole staff was, the young man that received us late at night was very attentive and helpful, the morning breakfast staff and the clean room everything here was 5 stars.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay at our hotel and for sharing your amazing experience with us. We are thrilled to hear that you had an exceptional stay and that our team exceeded your expectations in terms of customer service.  At our hotel, we believe that providing exceptional service is essential to ensuring a memorable guest experience. We are delighted to hear that you felt well taken care of by our entire team, from the young man who received you late at night to the breakfast staff and housekeeping team.  Your kind words are truly appreciated, and we will be sure to share your feedback with our team. We are especially pleased to hear that you found our rooms clean and comfortable, as we know that a good night's rest is essential to a great stay.  Thank you for your kind words, and we look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel in the near future.  Warm regards, Capri Suites Team

Summary: We recently stayed here. Capri is definitely a hidden Gem they have a hot breakfast. The staff are always welcoming and very attentive. I’ve stayed at many hotels and usually the GM is never seen but here you can catch the GM Jennie helping at the front desk she assisted us with getting our passes for the ART shuttle and even walked us through the entire process of navigating the app. She never seemed bothered by our ongoing questions we had. If you are coming to Anaheim I highly recommend staying at Capri this is our new go to hotel.
Room tip: If you book direct parking is free
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay at Capri and for taking the time to share your amazing experience with us. We are thrilled to hear that you had a wonderful stay and enjoyed our hot breakfast, attentive staff, and convenient location.  We appreciate your kind words about our General Manager, Jennie, and her exceptional service. We are proud to have her as part of our team, and we will definitely share your feedback with her.  It's great to know that we have become your new go-to hotel in Anaheim. We look forward to welcoming you back soon and providing you with another exceptional stay.  Best regards, The Capri Suites Team

Summary: Great hotel for the price the rooms are nice and their staff is very friendly. The rooms are clean and the lobby has cute decor and Disney drawing. I feel like you get a lot of value for your money because they include so much with such a good price. The rooms are very big and maintained well. The breakfast that was included was better than so much of the competition for its price and was honestly very good. I get a very mom and pop type vibe from this hotel In the best way possible! Cozy, clean and a great atmosphere.
Manager Response: Hey there! Thank you so much for taking the time to share your feedback with us. We truly appreciate any comments we receive as it's a great way to gain unbiased insight on how we're doing. It's fantastic to know that you had a positive experience and we hope to see you again soon at Capri Suites.

Summary: Upon booking there was a miscommunication. Carlos & Evelyn were extremely helpful in resolving my issue. Not only were they both very helpful & friendly but they also recommended food places (which we tried & loved) & things to do in the area. The location of the capri was also perfect. Lots of stuff walking distance. Another thing is you can see the Disney fireworks from the room which was pretty neat. My family had a really good time and I would definitely book with them if needed in the future.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind comments about our staff here at Capri Suites. We truly are committed to ensuring the satisfaction of our guests and are happy that you had a positive experience. Thank you for the feedback; have yourself a wonderful day.

Summary: Great and friendly staff , plus a great little breakfast. Clean rooms and my daughter loved the theme in our room ! Thank you to the staff everything was great ! A little further from the park but still within walking distance will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: We appreciate your kind feedback of Capri Suites and thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. Please do not hesitate to visit us again soon! Have a great day and thanks again.

Summary Heading: Chris and all staff was amazing
Summary: Super clean room. Great house keeping. Breakfast loaded with choices. Free internet.  Super great stay. Definitely will recommend and stay there again.  The hotel is close to MR Pho restaurant with amazing soup, as well as other restaurants, gas stations and convenience stores.
Manager Response: Our team appreciates your kind words, and are so glad to hear that your experience at Capri Suites met your expectations. We truly care for our clients and are delighted to know that our dedication shows. Take care, and thank you again for the review.

Summary Heading: Staff are one of it's finest assets
Summary: We stayed at Capri Suites 3 nights for a combination of work and vacation. The staff was welcoming, professional, always helpful, and had answers for every question we raised. Staff at all levels were friendly and helpful. The accommodations are plain but very clean and functional. A hot breakfast is serviced by staff cooking it on location: waffles, sausage, scrambled eggs and hash browns, plus muffins, toast, cereal and fruit. A small covered swimming pool and hot tub were welcome at the end of a long day.  A shuttle service picks you up out front to go to Disneyland for a pass of $6 a day. Many food choices a short walk away. I would happily return to Capri Suites on my next trip.
Manager Response: We're grateful to know that your experience with us was an amazing one! We're always happy to hear appreciation from our guests. We look forward to seeing you again soon at Capri Suites.

Summary: We stayed here for a quick overnight while visiting Disneyland. The staff went above and beyond our expectations. They allowed us to park our car in the morning before check in so we didn't have to park at Disneyland. They helped us set up the shuttle service on our cell that picked us up in front of hotel. So easy! We missed breakfast by an hour but they prepared 3 hot to go meals for us for free! Food was awesome and all the staff very friendly and helpful. Great location. Definitely will stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind comments about our staff here at Capri Suites! We truly are committed to ensuring the satisfaction of our clients and are happy that you had a positive experience. Thank you for the feedback; have yourself a wonderful day.

Summary: The room was just a box stuck in in a dark outside hallway. There was no place to sit, just the beds and a desk chair. We were there 4 nights with no closet or anywhere to hang our clothes.  The toilet had major problems.
Manager Response: Our team works hard to ensure that every guests that walks through our doors receives the best in care. While we always appreciate any feedback we obtain, we welcome any guests that wishes to discuss concerns they have to reach out to us directly at (714) 495-2400.

Summary: The front desk staff were very friendly and helpful and answered all our questions. The room rates are very reasonable and the room was amazing! The mattress was so comfortable and the pillows as well. We did suggest that they place another waste basket in the bedroom, having only one waste basket made it inconvenient.  We didn't have time to enjoy the free breakfast, but had time to enjoy their coffee and baggles. I would recommend Capri Suites Anaheim to my family and friends.
Manager Response: Hey there, thanks for the kind words! We're thrilled to hear how much you enjoyed your experience with us and we hope to see you again at Capri Suites!

Summary: What a fabulous welcome!  The reception staff are so nice and have a great sense of humour! The rooms are clean, beds are comfy and I love how the bedroom is sectioned off from the living room. Their hospitality is amazing.  An easy walk/shuttle to Disneyland that actually stops in front of the suites! The spin wheel is also a great addition to the reception. I’d highly recommend this accomodation!
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind comments about our staff here at Capri Suites. We truly are committed to ensuring the satisfaction of our guests and are happy that you had a positive experience. Thank you for the feedback; have yourself a wonderful day.

Summary: Breakfast was good with plenty of choices. The rooms were clean and comfortable. The best part that was convenient was the pool and hot tub, closed area and kid friendly as well. Will stay here again for the next visit.
Manager Response: We appreciate your kind feedback of capri Suites and thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. We can't wait to see you back at our property! Have a great day and thanks again.

Summary: We stayed three nights.  During our stay, we interacted with Evelyn, Chris, Alec and Carlos.  All 4 of these employees were extremely  helpful, courteous, friendly and very accommodating.   We stayed in a newly renovated suite which had 2 queen sized beds, a sofa sleeper, 2 big TVs, a microwave, and a refrigerator.  The sofa sleeper and one of the TVs were in a separate area closed off from the main bedroom. Buffet breakfast was included and very tasty.  The shuttle to Disneyland was right outside the hotel.  Restaurants, fast food and shops were all within walking distance of the hotel.  For the price, this was an excellent choice and I would definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind comments about our staff here at . We truly are committed to ensuring the satisfaction of our clients and are happy that you had a positive experience. Thank you for the feedback; have yourself a wonderful day.

Summary: We stayed for 4 nights this October for a DisneyLand trip.  Pros: -daily breakfast -convenience to the park -can see fireworks from the hotel -friendly staff -spacious rooms, updated. Great for families.  -our room had a living room and then bedroom which was nice for when the little was going to bed.  Cons: -floors were so dirty, we asked for cleaning one day and they never came, the next day claimed it was mopped and it wasn’t. Floors felt slippery and after walking from the shower to the bed your feet were BLACK with a weird sticky dirt. I wish I would have taken pictures of our socks.  -the 2nd night sheets that were too small for my bed were put on and came off the whole night. Asked for a replacement and never came. -loud rooms, not well insulated.  Overall, I’d stay again
Manager Response: He thanks for taking time out of your day to give us feedback on your last visit. We hope we can chat more about what we can do better next time! We always want to improve our customer service, because our customers deserve it. Give us a call at (714)495-2400  when you can.

Summary Heading: Capri Suites, clean, comfortable, convenient, AWESOME!
Summary: Thank you guest services for a smooth and simple check-in process, I appreciated the text-message updates to prep for arrival. The Double Queen Studio had clean, comfortable beds, a nice stand-up shower, and a stunning 4K Samsung TV.   The reservation process was a piece of cake, the location was so convenient my friend and I had more time to have fun than we originally planned! We were in town for a show at Chain Reaction, had time to stop by Golden Road Brewery, and highly recommend this location to anyone looking to book a Disney trip.
Manager Response: That is so amazing to hear! Thank you so much for taking the time to share your feedback with our team at . It's great to know that we continue to provide our customers with everything they need. Have a great day!

Summary: The rooms are clean and comfortable and the staff is on point and super sweet . Festive too.  I  hope to be your guest again and again. A special thank you to Carlos and Eva .  You  guys are awesome sauce.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words Jessica!. Were very glad and are looking forward to seeing you again. Thank you for choosing Capri Suites Anaheim.

Summary: We were in town for a trade show and opted to stay here. The hotel is 15 minute walk to the convention center front door, and has a very friendly staff.  Would recommend for people visiting the Anaheim convention center
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time there review us here at Capri Suites. We appreciate your kind feed back as we strive to give our guests a great stay. We look forward to seeing you gain!

Summary Heading: Great place with good location for a reasonable price…..
Summary: The location was excellent to Disneyland.  I hesitated after reading the old reviews before the new management took over.  After taking a chance, I was glad I did.  The staff was outstanding, breakfast was great, the location was convenient to stores and restaurants.  The rooms were nice and remodeled.   Be aware that the rooms do not have closets and/or dresses to to store clothes.  If you can be ok with the basics, this place would be a great choice with reasonable pricing.
Manager Response: We appreciate your kind feedback of Capri Suites and thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. Please do not hesitate to visit us again soon! Have a great day and thanks again.

Summary: Perfect for budget travelers. We stayed one night while visiting Disneyland. The staff were very friendly and attentive. It's an older building, but  the rooms have been updated and the room was very clean.  We liked the extra room and liked the modern shower. Breakfast was good. It felt safe and well kept. The only reason I did not give a 5 star is it was noisy from the main street (we were in room at front) and I would prefer better quality bed covers.  I would not hesitate to recommend or stay again though.
Manager Response: Hey there! Thank you so much for taking the time to share your feedback with us. We truly appreciate any comments we receive as it's a great way to gain unbiased insight on how we're doing. It's fantastic to know that you had a positive experience and we hope to see you again soon at Capri Suites Anaheim!

Summary: We stayed at Capri Suites for 5 nights and loved our stay. The rooms are spacious, clean and renovated. We liked that there was a microwave and a fridge. The shuttle bus to Disney was right out the door so that made it very handy. The hotel is walking distance to Disney, but for us it was a little far. After a long day of walking at Disney we didn’t feel like walking back, so the shuttle buses came in handy.  One of the reasons I chose this hotel was because not only was it affordable but they have a delicious continental breakfast. You can get waffles, eggs, hash brown patties, sausage, toast, oranges and cereal. As well, we could not have asked for better customer service. All the hotel staff were very friendly and helpful. We would definitely not hesitate to start here again.
Manager Response: Hello, thank you for taking the time to share your detailed feedback! We are thrilled to hear that you have nothing but amazing things to say about our team at Capri Suites and what we offer! Please do not heists to visit us again on your next Disney Trip! See you then.

Summary Heading: One of the best places to stay in anaheim
Summary: This has to be one of the best places to stay in anaheim. They have great big rooms with 2 tvs and 2 living room. It is spacious and clean. They also has breakfast that is worth waking up for. I usually never go to breakfast but this place has breakfast that you would want to wake up to. Egg sausage hash brown cereal and juices, it's well worth it. The staff is incredible and very helpful. These guys will go out of their way to accommodate you and it's been a pleasure. I definitely won't be looking around any other hotels because I know capri is my go to from now on
Manager Response: Hey there, thanks for the kind words and five star rating! We're thrilled to hear how much you enjoyed your experience with us and we hope to see you again at Capri Suites! Have an amazing day!

Summary: This was one of the best experiences I’ve had with hotel customer service. We were able to communicate through calls AND text, plus the staff was very friendly. They made us feel safe and welcomed. The room was extremely affordable considering it was down the street from Disneyland. The room was very clean and modern looking, plus the AC worked very well. Thank you, staff!
Manager Response: That is so amazing to hear, marenae15! Thank you so much for taking the time to share your feedback with our team at Capri Suites. It's great to know that we continue to provide our customers with everything they need. Have a great day and please do not hesitate to visit us again soon!

Summary: I found mice poop in my room and contacted management nonstop with no response. Not a very clean hotel.  The front desk staff was very nice and had me moved to another room. The staff serving the breakfast was very nice as well. They were the highlight of my stay.  It is a shame because I would have had a good stay if management actually cared about their guests and talked to me about it. Poor customer service skills on the management level. I used to work in the hotel industry and would never ignore a guests concerns.
Manager Response: Hello Pricilla, we are sorry to about this misunderstanding. At Capri Suites we always do our best to ensure all our guest are well taken care of and prioritized. We would love to speak to you more about this to ensure we don't loose a valued customer. Our phone number is (714)495-2400 please contract us at your earliest convince. Thank you for your feedback and we hope to hear from you soon.

Summary: As I was visiting the Disneyland resort for 3 days I just needed a hotel to sleep and clean up as I wasn’t planning to be in the room much.  The room I got had a king size bed and had a mini fridge, microwave, and desk but no where really to store your clothes so if you are a light packer this place will work for you. The bathroom looked like it was recently remodeled and in good condition. Breakfast was included and pretty decent and parking here is roughly $10 a night. The only downside was that the room was facing Harbor Blvd so it was easy to hear the traffic even on the second floor. I had pretty noisy neighbors as well and one morning walking out of my room they had put their overfilled trash can and spilled drinks outside. I don’t know if housekeeping was requested for
Manager Response: Hey there! Thank you so much for taking the time to share your feedback with us. We truly appreciate any comments we receive as it's a great way to gain unbiased insight on how we're doing. It's fantastic to know that you had a positive experience and we hope to see you again soon at Capri Suites Anaheim.

Summary: We booked a room with two double beds for three nights. Upon checking in, we were informed that there were no more doubles available, and that we were being “upgraded” to a suite with a King size bed and a sofa sleeper. Upon entering the room, we realized that it’s sparsely furnished, no closet, no table or floor lamps (just bright ceiling lights), and the pull out sofa bed has no sheets, blankets, or pillows! Not what we were expecting after having driven for several hours! The front desk clerk was kind enough to find me a clean sheet and blanket, but was unable to locate a clean pillow.   As I write this review at 1am, I can hear the loud voices of numerous people outside our room, milling around the parking lot, and walking back and forth past our room. This motel apparently
Manager Response: Our guests are very important to us and we are sorry to hear we may have let you down! Let us know more about what happened and how we can remedy that for your next visit. Give us a call directly when you're able.

Summary: My husband and I attended a conference there in Anaheim.  The hotel was within walking distance, about a 10 minute walk. It was clean and updated, we had 2 TV's, 2 rooms, a microwave & refrigerator. we received a hot breakfast every morning that consisted of: Scramble eggs, waffles, 2 sausage and hash brown. There was also fruit, cereal, toast, bagels, coffee, juices and milk. The covered pool & jacuzzi was great! There is an elevator...
Manager Response: We appreciate your kind feedback of Capri Suites and thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. Please do not hesitate to visit us again soon! Have a great day and thanks again.

Summary: Absolutely loved it! Breakfast was good and the rooms are nice with a nice shower. I would definitely go back! My kids loved it as well. Walking distance to restaurants, Convention center, gas stations and Disney.
Manager Response: Our team appreciates your kind words, and are so glad to hear that your experience at Capri met your expectations. We truly care for our guest and are delighted to know that our dedication shows. Take care, and thank you again for the review.

Summary: July 2-3 2022,  We stayed this past weekend for my friend'swedding, but our room was not a suite double rooms it was a stand room nothing like how it showed in the website booking.com if you guys can fix that people would appreciate it.
Manager Response: Hello our team apologizes about the misunderstanding. However, if there is an issues with a reservation made through a third party we highly suggest to contact the third party the reservation was booked through since unfortunately we have no control over these reservations. To avoid issues like these we suggest to give us a call and book directly through us! We hope we can see you back at Capri.

Summary Heading: Nice front desk staff & fine for the night.
Summary: We wound up needing a low cost 1 night stay near Anaheim convention center. We found this for under $100 dollars. It was better than expected. Front desk staff were nice, we checked in right away to an "upgraded room" the bathroom was new, and the bed was comfortable. It was fine for one night. Clean, and there was a simple breakfast provided free. Bagel was actually good! And I'm from NY!  If you just need a motel type place to stay a night or two I would say the Capri was fine. We walked to the convention center and felt safe.
Manager Response: We appreciate the lovely feedback of Capri Suites. Thank you and have a great day! We hope to see you soon!

Summary: Capri Suites Anaheim did not meet our expectations... they exceeded them! Staff was friendly and the other guests were quiet. The rooms were so nice and comfy, with plenty of room for our large family. About a six minute drive from Disney. We LOVED staying here and will make Capri Suites our home away from home on all future trips.  ❤️
Manager Response: That is so amazing to hear, MrsRuelas8694! Thank you so much for taking the time to share your feedback with our team at Capri. It's great to know that we continue to provide our customers with everything they need. Have a great day and we hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Start off your day with free filling breakfast before jumping on the Anaheim ART bus Harbor Line for a quick lift to Disney. After a long day at the park, return to a clean open concept room and rest on a mattress that feels like a cloud.  The room design is modern minimalism, which provides a larger open space. Plus, the room design prevents the likelihood for any accumulated dust behind bulky furniture, which is common in most hotels.   Be advised that the room did not have a closet, so if you are the type that prefers to not live directly out of your suitcase, the lack of a closet might be a hiccup.   I enjoyed my stay at Capri. My only gripe was the lack of a room safe.   When I stayed, the ART bus drivers were refusing to stop at Capri, despite it being on the Harbor Line.
Manager Response: Hello and thank you for taking the time to share your detailed feedback! We are thrilled to hear that you have nothing but amazing things to say about our team at Capri Suites and what we offer.We hope to see you back on your next Disney Trip.

Summary: 5-day stay for family Disneyland Trip. Room was clean with plenty of space (2 Queen bed), staff was nice every day, early morning and late at night. Breakfast was really good! ( Mini waffles, sausage, eggs, hash, cereal, toast, bagels, juice and coffee) walking distance to Disneyland and everything else on the main street (Harbor Blvd). Really loved the Hot Tub at night!  Only 'complaint' was very low water pressure in shower. Other than that, it's worth the savings.
Manager Response: Hey there, thanks for the kind words! We're thrilled to hear how much you enjoyed your experience with us and we hope to see you again at Capri Suites!

Summary: Great Location !  Close to the parks and Toy Story Parking lot. We arrived and check in was a breeze the front staff was amazing and accommodating. We were pleasantly  surprised the room was spacious and newly remodeled with a large sitting area and TV a-joining  bed room with a barn door and a large shower that were all new. The rooms are inviting with modern finishes!    They have a good hot breakfast before you head out to the parks. As well as plenty of parking.   Our room had to queen beds which was more than enough space for 2 people. Beds were soft and comfy. Noise was  nonexistent during the night !Plus this location is right next door to Joes Italian ice!
Manager Response: We appreciate your kind feedback of Capri and thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. Please do not hesitate to visit us again to see our process! Have a great day and thanks again.

Summary Heading: Good location but don’t get deposite back for no reason
Summary: This hotel has good sized rooms but equipment is not well taken care of like TVs are outdated and don’t work. We were barely in the room since we went to Disney so the room wasn’t really used or dirty and left it spotless but for some reason the deposit was not given back. Very upset because I thought this was an ok hotel and now we won’t be going back or recommending to family going to Disney soon. Save your money and go to a chain hotel. They just wanna take your money sadly.
Manager Response: Hello, while we appreciate you voicing your concerns, we would like the opportunity to speak with you directly to help resolve this. We are more than happy to email you a copy of your receipt stating your deposit has been voided and not charged nor kept. Please get in touch with us at (714)495-2400 or email us at info@caprisuitesanaheim.com we are always here to help. Although are still in the process of renovations and would appreciate it if you gave and your family gave us a second chance while we finish up placing new furniture. Thank you we hope we can speak with you soon.

Summary: This hotel is easy to stay at because it’s not as big as the other tourist ones.  It’s also affordable and you get most of the amenities you find at more affordable hotels.  The customer service is excellent too.  I’d stay here again.
Manager Response: We're grateful to know that your experience with us was an amazing one! We're always happy to hear appreciation from our customers. We look forward to seeing you again soon at Capri Suites!

Summary: This hotel was very convenient, staff was helpful and accommodating. Very close to Disneyland parking. The area was convenient with store and dinning within walking distance. I would return here for another family trip
Manager Response: Our team appreciates your kind words, and are so glad to hear that your experience at Capri Suites met your expectations. We truly care for our guest and are delighted to know that our dedication shows. Take care, and thank you again for the review.

Summary: Very enjoyable. We stayed 2 nights for a Disneyland trip. We got a suite because it was cheaper for 5 of us. We made a special request for towels folded like animals and they delivered! Breakfast was delicious, everything was clean, and the park was just around the corner! Everyone was very friendly. Highly recommend.
Manager Response: Hello family Peppers, thank you for your kind comments about our property and the efforts put into your stay. We truly are committed to ensuring the satisfaction of our clients and are happy that you had a positive experience. Thank you for the feedback; have yourself a wonderful day.

Summary: I was so pleased with our 2 night stay here.  The room was newly remodeled and very clean. The bed was comfortable. They included a hot breakfast and it was good.  The 2 ladies cooking breakfast were kind and put a lot of effort into making it a good breakfast. The property was clean and everyone I encountered seem to care and wanted you to have a quality stay. We will be staying here again when we are in Anaheim!
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind comments about our staff here at Capri. We truly are committed to ensuring the satisfaction of our clients and are happy that you had an excellent experience. Thank you for the feedback; have yourself a wonderful day. We can't wait to see you back soon!

Summary: We enjoyed our stay at the Capri Suites, Anaheim. We stayed in a three bedroom suite, which was the perfect size for our family. They provided a hot breakfast every day. It was perfect for our budget as well.
Manager Response: Our team thanks you for taking the time to leave us your review! We are so happy to hear that you had a fantastic experience with our team at Capri. Have a great day!

Summary: We stayed here at the beginning of our Disneyland trip and it was great! The front desk staff was friendly and helpful. Our room was clean and spacious! We stayed at a larger chain hotel for the rest of our trip and our room at Capri Suites was WAY nicer!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review, we appreciate your kind words of our staff and property. We hope we can see you back on your next Disneyland trip! Till then, take care!

Summary: I would give the staff 5 stars, dining area 4 stars, and rooms 3 stars. It looks like some renovation work was done recently so the rooms were nice, but the furniture was worn and slightly damaged. The room I stayed in didn’t have a desk or chair or a closet. Fairly noisy at night, the walls are pretty thin.  About 15 minute walk from Disney and 10 minute walk from convention center.
Manager Response: We appreciate your kind feedback of Capri and thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. We are working on our furniture and decor please do not hesitate to visit us again to see our process! Have a great day and thanks again.

Summary: We had a wonderful stay in a newly remodeled suite and has a free breakfast which was a plus. The front desk was a fast and easy process for checking in. Evelyn was a great help she told me all the information I needed before even asking. I will defiantly stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you, Yvonne. We appreciate your kind review of Capri Suites and Evelyn. We are thrilled to hear your stay was an excellent one, we hope you will visit again soon. As a valued guest, we look forward to taking care of your needs in the future. Until we see you, take care!

Summary: My family and I came on a Disney trip at the beginning of March for a few days and loved the service here! Loved the stay & definitely loved the breakfast! Yummy! After we checked out we then booked right away for another Disney trip we had just this past weekend! The staff in the front desk are very nice and we’re helpful on any questions me and i family had! Anytime we will stay in Anaheim we will be staying here!
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind comments about our staff here at our property. We truly are committed to ensuring the satisfaction of our clients and are happy that you had a positive experience. Thank you for the feedback; have yourself a wonderful day. We can't wait to see you back!

Summary Heading: Cockroach found in bed do not go
Summary: A literal cockroach was found upon one of our parties bed when waking up. The manager wasn’t there any days that week and the best she could do was half off that night which was laughable. Looks nothing like the pictures and overall not a nice play to stay at, shouldn’t even be considered a “suite”.
Manager Response: Our team is dedicated to providing all our guest with an excellent stay and work hard to ensure our guests are never impacted with issues such as you experienced when staying with us. As part of our preventative program we treat our property on a biweekly basis and treat every room on rotation. The manager on duty offered accommodations as soon as it was reported and also offered a discount along with free parking for one of your vehicles to make it right. If you would like a copy of the report, please contact us directly so we can provide you with one. We apologize for the less than perfect stay and hope you will give us another opportunity in the future.

Summary: Very nice and clean rooms.. excellent breakfast.. highly recommend.. very nice at check in and easy to get around. Parking is tight on days when they are full but you can expect that anywhere around Disneyland..
Manager Response: Our team appreciates your kind words, and are so glad to hear that your experience staying with us met your expectations. We truly care for our guests and are delighted to know that our dedication shows. Take care, and thank you again for the review. We hope to see you back soon!

Summary: Loud street noise + light coming through the window and door frame = little sleep.  Room was clean, but don't come here if you want a good night sleep.  I was given a sleep mask when I checked in, so the hotel knew of the specific room's issue.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We aim to provide an exceptional experience for all of our customers. We're sorry we may have missed the mark with your visit. Please reach out to us at (714)495-2400 to let us know  how we can do better. We currently in the process of resolving the issue and hope we can see you back. We will not let you down!

Summary: We just got home from a Week long Disney trip. We stayed in the 3 queen suite. The room was super clean and newly renovated. The staff was super friendly and very accommodating. There was a decent breakfast included it was available until 10am every morning. The beds were just ok I believe they are memory foam and they were fairly thin especially to be directly on a frame base and no box springs another issue with the bed was the base doesn’t lock the mattress into place and ours kept sliding out from the wall and our pillows would fall behind the headboard. Being this was a family trip and there were 6 of us in the room it was very difficult to have enough room for suitcases. There are no closets and no dressers in this suite we all had to live out of our suitcases which made
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for taking time out of your day to give us feedback on your last visit. We hope we can chat more about what we can do better next time! We always want to improve our customer service, because our customers deserve it. Give us a call at (714)495-2400.

Summary: I was here to participate to some conferences annd present one of these. I encountered other persons and discovered a country when I have never go. I visited new places and discovered new culture and way of life. It was a good experience.
Manager Response: That is so amazing to hear! Thank you so much for taking the time to share your feedback with our team at Capri Suites Anaheim. It's great to know that we continue to provide our customers with everything they need. Have a great day!

Summary: Great stay  everyone was very kind and helpful breakfast was good too  great place to stay for Disneyland Family friendly the shuttle drops and picks up right in the front of the hotel I will stay again next time
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience at our hotel. We're glad to see you enjoyed our hospitality and we look forward to seeing you once again!

Summary Heading: Late check in was so easy
Summary: Clean and updated rooms.  Excellent service.  I arrived at midnight and Alec at the front desk was amazing. He made check in easy and fast. He had excellent customer service and even brought us up an extra blanket.    He made us feel so safe that we came in so late.      This is going to be my new go to hotel when I come to Disneyland.   The rooms and beds were so comfortable.
Manager Response: We're grateful to know that your experience with us was an amazing one! We're always happy to hear appreciation from our customers. We will let Alec know what a wonderful job he did assisting you. We look forward to seeing you again soon at Capri Suites Anaheim.

Summary: Excellent Service, Amazing Staff, Clean Room, Really Nice Pool/Jacuzzi Area Housekeeping Manager Luz Garcia So Beautifully Amazing Went Above And Beyond For My Mom's Birthday Trip Highly Recommend You Visit 5 Star ✨✨✨✨
Manager Response: Hey there, thanks for the kind words! We're thrilled to hear how much you enjoyed your experience with us. We are happy to hear that Luz made your stay even more welcoming and enjoyable. We hope to see you again at Capri Suites Anaheim.

Summary: Overall this hotel exceeded my expectations. I was looking for somewhere to stay near Disneyland. This hotel was quite affordable and gave me all the amenities I was looking for. The staff working there were extremely helpful, especially the front desk. One of the girls that helped me the most was Evelyn. The breakfast was not all that but it was okay.
Manager Response: That is so amazing to hear Destiny! Thank you so much for taking the time to share your feedback with our team at Capri Suites Anaheim. It's great to know that we continue to provide our customers with everything they need. We will let Evelyn know what a wonderful job she did into ensuring your stay with us was comfortable and helped exceed your expectations. Have a great day!

Summary Heading: It was good for the price
Summary: everything was nice and clean, offered good breakfast. The only issues I had was that the water in the shower was not warm or hot enough. Also, I heard garbage trucks and minor construction of some sort early in the morning. Other than that, I would stay again.
Manager Response: We're glad to hear that you were very satisfied with our services. Thank you for working with us at Capri Suites Anaheim. We will use your feedback to ensure all our guest have a comfortable and enjoyable stay.  We hope you have a great day.

Summary Heading: Nice clean room close by Disney for a family of 5
Summary: Clean and comfortable real size queen beds bearkfast was made to order which was really nice Disneyland was three or four blocks away from the room restaurants near by taco Bell is right across the street
Manager Response: Thanks a bunch for your kind words!. It's reviews like this that make us at Capri Suites Anaheim excited to come into work every day.

Summary: It was a chilly January night and I was in the market for a quality hotel to rest my head. In comes the Capri Suites Anaheim to fulfill my ever desire on top of the amazing service I received from the employees Evelyn and Chris. They made sure the check in process went as smoothly as possible was also making sure they left no unanswered questions. I couldn't have asked for a better experience and i truly hope the management at the Capri Suites Anaheim is well aware of the amazing gems they have working there
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind comments about our Chris and Evelyn here at Capri Suites Anaheim. We truly are committed to ensuring the satisfaction of our clients and are happy that you had a positive experience. We will be sure to let both Chris and Evelyn know what wonderful job they are doing. Thank you for the feedback; have yourself a wonderful day!

Summary: We were staying at the hotel for 9 days from 1/30/21 to 1/9/22 , they gave us very good service, all the staff were very friendly and the place very clean, ladies cleaning make a very good job , the place is very close to disneyland  too
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review we appreciate the time that was taken to do so. We are glad your stay with us comfortable and satisfactory we hope to see you back on your next vacation!

Summary: Let's start with the good- good price and good location. Everything else was pretty bad. The shower barely trickled anything more than Luke warm water (and I mean trickle), then when the cleaners came they left our door open for the entire day until we got back at 11pm. The front desk just said that they would "check the cameras to make sure no one went jn my room" uh. Thanks? And then the final nail was our heater was flooding the room, at one point so much that it soaked a jacket I happened to accidentally have draped over a table with the sleeve touching the ground. They responded to that by saying they would send a technician which never happened.
Manager Response: Hello, we appreciate the time that was taken to leave us a review. We sincerely apologize for the unfortunate events and mistakes that took place throughout your stay with us. It would be great if you could contact us directly at (714)495-2400 to make the situation right. We hope to hear from you soon. Have a great rest of your day!

Summary Heading: Within walking distance to parks and great size for a family of 4
Summary: The rooms are a great size for a family, I stayed in the 2 bed suite and the couch also converted into a bed (we didn't need it, but it is nice if a larger family needs another bed). We brought our pack and play and it fit in the room without making it feel crammed, it wasn't even in the way :) The rooms have laminate flooring and appear to be newly remodeled.  The suite was a great size. They provide free breakfast, but we woke up too late and didn't get to enjoy it (I saw a waffle iron and was sad to miss out on fresh waffles and eggs, I just grabbed fruit and a coffee to go). It is really close to Disneyland, easily walkable if you don't want use their structures (the trams aren't running anyway, so the distance is about the same) They also have friendly staff that is
Manager Response: Hello Diana! Thank you for leaving us a review! We appreciate the time that was taken to do and we are so glad that your stay with us was more than satisfactory and convent for your trip. We hope to see you back on your next trip to Anaheim!

Summary: Very clean and affordable. Definitely will be back in the future. My only complaint is that the pillows were very flat, however, the bed itself was comfortable. Huge space, great for families. Location within walking distance of the parks. Front desk staff very friendly.
Manager Response: Hello Josie! Thank you for the time that was taken to leave us a review. We are glad your stay with us was comfortable and convenient for you. We will most definitely take your feedback under consideration! Have a good rest of your day!

Summary: Breakfast was hot and plentiful - scrambled eggs, sausage, hashbrowns, waffles, coffee, OJ. The rooms have been renovated. Included a semi separate couch area - nice! The pool/jacuzzi are not open currently open:(
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to leave us a review! We are glad you enjoyed your stay and our breakfast. Unfortunately, our pool and spa is closed but will be opening up soon! We hope to see you back once it's up and running!

Summary: I went with my girlfriend Lily here for a getaway. my stay was great! Jennie was super helpful and nice. She had great customer service and made my check in process really easy! I’ll definitely be returning when I get the chance!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time out of your day to leave us such a positive review. We are glad to hear your gateway was great and your compliment to Jennie will be passed down. We hope to see you back!

Summary: I stayed at the Capri for a one night stay. The location is a 10min walk to the convention center. It looks like the first floors are currently in renovations. I stayed on the 4th floor and it appeared to have been recently updated. The rooms are quiet and clean. Breakfast was a surprisingly nice for the budget hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your positive review Binh! We are glad to hear your stay was comfortable and convenient to your plans! We hope to see you soon!

Summary: I took my two sons here (7and 10) because it's so close to the Disneyland Park and it has the most awesome little water park. The boys played in that for hours! The staff is exceptionally kind. If I could make the stay better, we wouldn't hear the freeway as well and there would be continental breakfast. This is not a complaint, we slept well. The coffee in the room is great. There is a restaurant across the street and the price we paid for 1 night was acceptable. I recommend it for sure.
Manager Response: Hello Tera! We are glad you had fun on your family trip unfortunately you may have reviewed the wrong place.

Summary: Staff:  5 Stars +!!!  Price: 4 Stars Ambience: 3 Stars. Cleanliness: 5 Stars.  Customer Service: 5 Stars.  Overall: 5 Star Stay!    From the reservation to checkout, reception/ check in and entire staff were kind, friendly, helpful, and professional.  Could not be more grateful for the welcoming experience we had at this hotel.  I have had many stays at reasonably budgeted and comparable hotels. The staff that works at this hotel simply said… They just get it. Thank you for hiring a staff that presents your organization with pride, while putting customer service first.
Manager Response: Hello! We appreciate the time you took to leave us such a great review! We are glad to hear our staff made your experience exceptional. We hope to see you back at our property on your next trip!

Summary: I had a very pleasant overnight stay at Capri Suites. Very nice attentive staff and very nice newly refurbished rooms. I was impressed by the cleanliness overall. I ill definitely stay again. Very pleased.
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us such a positive review! Our staff is glad to hear your stay with us was above and beyond. We hope to see you back!

Summary: This hotel is the newly remodeled hotel in what was once the Ramada Inn. I was here for 3 nights and 4 days, and it was perfect for those just looking for the basics of a hotel and closeness to the Disneyland parks. Those wishing to use the Toy Story lot, it’s less than a 5 minute drive. You could also walk if you’re up for it. The location is great!  Now, I will say, this is truly just the basics of a stay. That is really everything but a closet: mini fridge, microwave, desk and chair—just no closet lol. That was odd to me, but they provided a nice hutch to hang things on. I’d suggest to the Inn to maybe add a hook on the door of the bathroom to hang a towel since I had to use the hutch for clothes to hang up. There was a lot of unused floor space. Since it was just me, it made
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us! Our team works hard to ensure every guest has a pleasant stay and we appreciate your review. Thank you so much for your kind words, as an independent business we really appreciate the endorsement of our customers. We will take your feedback about the hooks in the bathroom and have them added. Thank you again for your time and have a wonderful day!

Summary: Thank the staff @ The Capri Suites, They took care of me and myy family when we stayed for our trip to Disneyland , we got excellent services when needed answered questions professionally as well they was very friendly. i will stay there again!!!!!
Manager Response: Hello, Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us! Our team works hard to ensure every guest has a pleasant stay and we appreciate your review. Thank you so much for your kind words, as an independent business we really appreciate the endorsement of our customers. Thank you again for your time and have a wonderful day! We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Great place to stay. Friendly staff,  newly remodeled rooms and close to Disneyland. Free breakfast too. Walking distance to restaurants and shopping centers. A short drive to Universal Studios and local beaches. Bravo
Manager Response: Hello, Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us! Our team works hard to ensure every guest has a pleasant stay and we appreciate your review. Thank you so much for your kind words, as an independent business we really appreciate the endorsement of our customers. Thank you again for your time and have a wonderful day! We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Jennie is the manager at the Capri suites she is so down to earth!! She definitely made my stay unforgettable and knew where to go and what to do for any occasion!! I definitely recommend staying here and go visit my friend Jennie!
Manager Response: Hello, Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us! Our team works hard to ensure every guest has a pleasant stay and we appreciate your review. Thank you so much for your kind words, as an independent business we really appreciate the endorsement of our customers. Thank you again for your time and have a wonderful day! We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: New owners are awesome ! Had a great stay very pleasant even with construnction (: staff were super friendly . I will be a returning customer for sure. They had a vatiety of breakfast option in the preped to go bags my kids and i loved them
Manager Response: Hello, Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us! Our team works hard to ensure every guest has a pleasant stay and we appreciate your review. Thank you so much for your kind words, as an independent business we really appreciate the endorsement of our customers. Thank you again for your time and have a wonderful day! We hope to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: Fun trip out of the house
Summary: My family came to Anaheim for the touch of Disney. We arrived on Thursday and left Sunday. The staff at Capri Suites is very friendly and professional. Jennie was a lot of help informing my family about the ART bus services. They have newly remodeled rooms with a thermostat on the wall. We love the shower! Luz was also very helpful. We will definitely come back once Disneyland is open.
Manager Response: Hello, Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us! Our team works hard to ensure every guest has a pleasant stay and we appreciate your review. Thank you so much for your kind words, as an independent business we really appreciate the endorsement of our customers. Thank you again for your time and have a wonderful day! We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Out of all hotel experiences this hotel was by far the best. Great hospitality luz, eby and jennie made our families stay feel as if we were in our homes. I most definitely recommend this hotel to my family and friends.
Manager Response: Hello, Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us! Our team works hard to ensure every guest has a pleasant stay and we appreciate your review. Thank you so much for your kind words, as an independent business we really appreciate the endorsement of our customers. Thank you again for your time and have a wonderful day! We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Me and my boyfriend stayed 3 nights and the room was clean and had a lot of space in it. But Aubrey who works the front desk was super awesome and made the stay that much better. Thanks Aubrey for some of the best customer service out there!
Manager Response: Hello,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us! Our team works hard to ensure every guest has a pleasant stay and we appreciate your review. Thank you so much for your kind words, as an independent business we really appreciate the endorsement of our customers. Thank you again for your time and have a wonderful day!

Summary: Looking for an inexpensive place to stay, whether with friends, family and/or partner??? The Capri is a great cozy hotel with awesome and very friendly staff. Have stayed at a few different hotels in the area, some more expensive some less, however, the genuine kindness and hospitality from the staff, set the Capri apart from the rest! Aubrey and Carlos have both been the sweetest and most helpful hotel employees me and my family have had! They are awesome. We can be a handful (mom of a 9 and 10 yr old all with lots of questions) No matter the hour both, Aubrey and Carlos have been patient and more than happy to help meet our needs! The rooms are clean as well as pretty big with living room area apart from the bedroom. Totally worth every dollar spent. Thank you Capri! And thank
Manager Response: Hello,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us! Our team works hard to ensure every guest has a pleasant stay and we appreciate your review. Thank you so much for your kind words, as an independent business we really appreciate the endorsement of our customers. Thank you again for your time and have a wonderful day!

Summary: Hey sooooo.... me and the hubby stayed in this awesome suite and let me say, our living situation is up in the air and just one night in the jacuzzi I feel revamped!! Thank you to the ladies up front we will be back 🤘🤘🤘
Manager Response: Thank you for your terrific feedback. We appreciate your business and hope you will stay with us again soon.

Summary: My family stayed here. We were a little scared after reading the reviews but when we arrived Eby greeted us at the front desk and she was very welcoming. The building is old and is in need of a remodel which Eby & Jennie informed us that they would be doing a total remodel on the entire building. We are looking forward to coming back to see how it looks when it is finished. The location and STAFF are awesome!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your stay and acknowledging our team's efforts. We are committed to providing excellent service, and we are glad to know we helped to make your trip a great one! We look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: This stay was not the most outstanding stay ever...we picked this place by availability and location. Not knowing what to expect or have super high expectations we arrived in our room no problems checking in...we went to the park upon returning to the room we notice things that needed updating, fixing etc. so the next morning we brought our concerns to Jennie and the staff and they listened and were very accommodating. I was excited to here all the updates and remodeling they will be doing since they just took over the property on Wednesday 2/19/20. Can’t wait!! Good luck and see you soon! I can’t wait to see the updates online!! I’m hoping to leave 5 all across the board for everything right now 5 stars for the incoming staff!!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us! Our team works hard to ensure every guest has a pleasant stay and we appreciate your review.  Thank you again for your time and have a wonderful day!

Summary: The room looked pretty outdated but wasn't as bad as I thought it would be. Could use some better wifi honestly. But overall it was a pleasant stay. Jenny and evelyn were super welcoming and made the check in process really easy. I'm rating it a 5 star mainly for the service we received from the front desk. Keep up the good work. Cant wait to see how your remodel turns out!
Manager Response: Hello,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us! Our team works hard to ensure every guest has a pleasant stay and we appreciate your review. Thank you so much for your kind words, as an independent business we really appreciate the endorsement of our customers. Thank you again for your time and have a wonderful day!

Summary: We booked here because it was convenient to the Anaheim Convention Center for a trade show we were attending.  Big mistake!  The sign on the door said the elevator wasn't working, so we had to lug our suitcases up the outdoor staircase.  The sign looked like it had been there a while -- how long was the elevator broken??  Then, we got there about 2 p.m. and inquired about going ahead and checking in.  They admitted our room was ready, but wanted $25 for "early check in fee".  Really?  It cost them nothing to let us check in!  We said no.  Then the tv did not work and we had to call maintenance.  For the duration of our stay, we had to turn the tv off at the unit, the remote wouldn't work.  Then, the bathroom was really gross and run down,  badly in need of remodeling.  There was
Manager Response: Hello, We apologize we did not meet your expectations during your trip but wish to invite you back to our hotel once we have completed our renovation and it is safe to travel once again. Thank you and we hope to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: We traveled from work, we got 3 rooms. But rooms were not in good shape: -One room had a mattress stating against a wall getting dry by a fan, and a used soap. -Second room smell bad, the window was opened and didn't close.  -Third room had dirty covers over the bed, corner covered with cobwebs and rugs in bat situation. All rooms were on a bad shape, so we tried to cancel and leave ASAP the same night as soon as we got in the rooms.  But staff claim they have this policy where if they offer you another room they wont refund the night. Even though they didn't offer to us a second room they didn't refund the night, claiming they did offer the night, which was untrue. elevator didn't work, we got to claim the stairs with all the bags  Noisy air conditioner
Manager Response: Hello, We apologize we did not meet your expectations during your trip but wish to invite you back to our hotel once we have completed our renovation and it is safe to travel once again. Thank you and we hope to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: The hotel did have good location, but I would never recommend it to anyone. It was rundown and in desperate need of repair. Our tour picked it to stay in, so we didn’t have any choice but to stay in it.
Manager Response: Hello, We apologize we did not meet your expectations during your trip but wish to invite you back to our hotel once we have completed our renovation and it is safe to travel once again. Thank you and we hope to welcome you back again soon.

Summary Heading: Hands down the most disgusting hotel I have ever stated in.
Summary: Needed to book a room to attend the 2020 NAMM Show and this place was mid-priced at the time of booking - just under $300/night. My mistake was failing to read the reviews ahead of time.   The pictures speak for themselves. The place was infested, filthy, and in dire need of renovation or tear down. Cockroaches, filth and hair everywhere (including on towels), broken furnishings, and a leaky ceiling.   When I asked the front desk clerk (who was perfectly nice) why their ‘Market’ in the lobby was completely empty, they said that they were in the same boat and that my guess was as good as theirs.   I wish I could have booked another hotel somewhere else but literally everywhere was sold out for the show. I was and still am very sad.  Stay anywhere else for your own good.
Manager Response: Hello, We apologize we did not meet your expectations during your trip but wish to invite you back to our hotel once we have completed our renovation and it is safe to travel once again. Thank you and we hope to welcome you back again soon.

Summary Heading: Ok for last-minute but not completely satisfactory
Summary: The room felt really overpriced because it was outdated in decor/design. The bathroom was very old looking. The parking lot was always too full to park, even with my parking pass.  Service was very good though.  This hotel needs a facelift badly.
Manager Response: Hello, We apologize we did not meet your expectations during your trip but wish to invite you back to our hotel once we have completed our renovation and it is safe to travel once again. Thank you and we hope to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: If I could do no stars I would . This place is such a fraud.! I made a reservations on hotels.com which had pictures to the room , once I got to the hotel I got a total different room and to top it off completely filthy ! I called the front desk and the girl could do nothing. Management wasn’t in and they were fully booked . Not everyone was checked in so they do have rooms available but she refused to switch me rooms. Even tho she could give this crappy room to someone else. She said they made their reservations already . Hello I did too ! Give someone else the dirty room. First come first serve. All she could do is give me an email and phone number, management is here tomorrow. Great ! Of course ! I contacted hotels.com and the person that helped me was amazing . They noted
Manager Response: Hello, We apologize we did not meet your expectations during your trip but wish to invite you back to our hotel once we have completed our renovation and it is safe to travel once again. Thank you and we hope to welcome you back again soon.
